metadata.title: CVE-2017-5944 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The dashboard subscription interface in Request Tracker (RT) 4.x before 4.0.25, 4.2.x before 4.2.14, and 4.4.x before 4.4.2 might allow remote authenticated users with certain privileges to execute arbitrary code via a crafted saved search name.

criterions.comment: request-tracker4 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.1-4').
